name: Cappuccino
instruction: Step 1 - make around 40ml espresso and pour into a cup
Step 2 - Steam a milk and add to your cup
Step 3 [Optional] - Dust the surface with the cocoa powder

name: Iced latte
instruction: Step 1 - mix the hot espresso with ice cream
Step 2 - fill a cup with ice
Step 3 - add milk and stir until combined

name: Mocha
instruction: Step 1 - mix hot espresso with chocolate and mix until smooth
Step 2 - steam the milk and add to your prepared mixture

name: Cortado
instruction: Step 1 - Pour the espresso into a 4-6oz heatproof glass or cup, then pour over the steamed milk.
Step 2 - Finish with a little bit of foam on top.

name: Espresso Martini
instruction: Step 1 - mix the sugar with water on medium heat

Step 2 - Once the sugar syrup is cold, pour 1 tbsp into a cocktail shaker along with a handful of ice, the vodka, espresso and coffee liqueur. Shake until the outside of the cocktail shaker feels icy cold.
Step 3 - Strain into the chilled glasses. Garnish each one with coffee beans if you like.
